description:
Supple, stretchy, and sustainable. Made using CiClO fibres, the D Bah Ciclo Pro shorts keep their footprint small, so future generations can enjoy more time with their toes on the nose.

  • Recycled poly’ blend has a 4-way stretch and a tight weave for fast fabric recovery
  • CiClO fibres are recycled polyester fibres that will biodegrade in the natural conditions. So, if CiClO treated fibres do make it into the ocean or a landfill, they will biodegrade much like wool does. CiClO fibres are OEKO-TEX certified
  • Recycled materials used throughout, from the labels and buttons, to the drawcord
  • Micro Repel fabric coating repels water so your shorts stay drier and lighter for longer
  • Rear pocket wit a button closure
  • 7.5cm side panels give you more room to move
name: Billabong D Bah Ciclo Pro Short - Men's
